  • Deprecated Packages 
    Package and Description
    org.restlet.ext.emf
    Will be removed in next minor release.
    org.restlet.ext.javamail
    Will be removed in next major release.
    org.restlet.ext.jaxrs
    Will be removed in next minor release.
    org.restlet.ext.jibx
    Use an XML serialization technology such as Jackson instead.
    org.restlet.ext.lucene
    Will be removed in next major release.
    org.restlet.ext.nio
    Will be removed to favor lower-level network extensions allowing more control at the Restlet API level.
    org.restlet.ext.oauth
    Will be removed in next minor release.
    org.restlet.ext.openid
    Will be removed in next minor release.
    org.restlet.ext.raml
    Will be removed in next minor release.
    org.restlet.ext.simple
    Will be removed to favor lower-level network extensions allowing more control at the Restlet API level.
    org.restlet.ext.wadl
    Will be removed in next major release.

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.restlet.ext.oauth.OAuthException.getErrorURI()
    use OAuthException.getErrorUri() instead.
    org.restlet.ext.jaxrs.JaxRsApplication.getGuard()
    Use JaxRsApplication.getAuthenticator() instead.
    org.restlet.ext.jaxrs.JaxRsApplication.setGuard(Authenticator)
    Use JaxRsApplication.setAuthenticator(Authenticator) instead.
    org.restlet.ext.oauth.AuthorizationBaseServerResource.ungetAuthSession()
    Use AuthorizationBaseServerResource.resetAuthSession() instead.
